name: Abilene Flying Service
about: Abilene Flying Service, located in Abilene, Kansas, is a comprehensive aviation provider serving the Abilene Municipal Airport (K78). As a Fixed Base Operator (FBO), we offer a range of services including aircraft rental, airframe and powerplant maintenance, and ground transportation. Our facility includes amenities such as internet access, a pilot lounge, and courtesy cars. We specialize in pilot training under FAR Part 61, ensuring aspiring pilots receive top-notch instruction. With a focus on customer satisfaction and quality service, Abilene Flying Service is dedicated to meeting all your aviation needs. We guarantee our work and your satisfaction, making us a trusted choice in the region.
